entry.title: Articles – Tips, Guides & Wellness Notes
entry.summary: Browse all massage articles, tips, and wellness guides from Seven Angels Massage (SAM).
entry.content: Explore all Seven Angels Massage (SAM) guides on mobile massage, hotel outcalls, and relaxation in Metro Manila.

entry.title: Swedish vs Deep Tissue – Which Massage Do I Need?
entry.summary: Learn the difference between Swedish and deep tissue massage, and how to pick the best option for your body.
entry.content: Unsure whether to choose Swedish or deep tissue massage? This guide explains how each style works, who it’s for, and when to combine them in one session with Seven Angels Massage (SAM).

entry.title: Hotel Outcall Massage – What to Expect
entry.summary: A step-by-step look at how hotel outcall massage works in Manila and Makati.
entry.content: From booking to check-out, this article walks you through how a hotel outcall massage with Seven Angels Massage (SAM) works, what to prepare, and how we keep everything professional and comfortable.

entry.title: Best Times to Book a Mobile Massage in Makati
entry.summary: When Makati is buzzing, your body is tired. Here’s when to schedule a mobile massage for maximum calm.
entry.content: This guide helps you pick the best times of day to book a mobile massage in Makati, taking into account traffic, building quiet hours, and your own work schedule.
